item.title: My first post!
item.author: ano@contact.me (A.N. Other)
item.description:
My first post!

This is a static website and blog.

The source is written in Skribe, a document format that allows you to use embed scheme programs to create your document.

1 + 2 + 3 = 6

More about Skribe

You can find this lesson here.

Four reasons you should learn Skribe:

  1. Less formatting than HTML
  2. Easy to read even with formatting
  3. Powerful programming environment
  4. Allows you to automate the boring stuff.

To find out more about the Carpentries, go to the The Carpentries website.
